content.text:
What is the correct method for constructing the waterproofing layer of the basement exterior wall with coiled materials:<image 1>

A. The roll waterproof layer is laid on the upstream surface of the external wall
B. The roll waterproof layer is laid on the back surface of the external wall
C. The outer wall roll adopts the empty laying method
D.  When laying double layer coils, the two layers of coils are perpendicular to each other

The correct method for constructing the waterproofing layer of the basement exterior wall with coiled materials is:

A. The roll waterproof layer is laid on the upstream surface of the external wall.

This ensures that the waterproofing layer is directly exposed to the water pressure from the outside, providing effective protection against water infiltration.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
